channel.title: Plugins on Avalanche
channel.description: Recent content in Plugins on Avalanche

item.title: Anti Steal
item.description: Link to Plugin Instructions Place a sign on a storage item to make it protected

item.title: Teleport
item.description: Link to Plugin Teleport /spawn - Teleports Player to spawn /tpayes - Accepts Player Teleport Request /tpano - Declines Player Teleport Request /tpa off - Disables Teleport Requests /tpa on - Enables Teleport Requests Paid Commands /tpa username - Sends a Request to Player to Teleport to Them /tpahere username - Sends Request to Player to Teleport Them to You

item.title: Plugins
item.description: Teleport /spawn - Teleports Player to spawn /tpayes - Accepts Player Teleport Request /tpano - Declines Player Teleport Request /tpa off - Disables Teleport Requests /tpa on - Enables Teleport Requests Paid Commands /tpa username - Sends a Request to Player to Teleport to Them /tpahere username - Sends Request to Player to Teleport Them to You Discord SRV Since this plugin isn’t active right now I won’t list any commands
